<<header |=Installing Ocsigen>>

To install Ocsigen, just download the packages you want using [[https://opam.ocaml.org/|opam]],
the OCaml package manager.

[[wiki("ocsigen-start"):|Ocsigen-start]] is a good place to start:
{{{
$ opam install ocsigen-start
}}}
A tutorial is available [[wiki("tuto"):|here]].
